question: In which waterbody the famous "Zenobia Shipwreck" diving site is located?
explanation: The Zenobia Shipwreck Diving Site is located in the underground sea bed of the Mediterranean Sea close to Larnaca, Cyprus. In 1980, MS Zenobia, a Swedish-built Challenger-class RO-RO ferry, capsized and sank in the Mediterranean Sea. Several travelling guides rated this shipwreck diving site as one of the top ten recreational diving sites in the world.
